name: Intake Survey
description: A survey to gather information about a patient's medications at intake.

survey_items.text: Please answer the following questions with regard to your Rheumatoid Arthritis
Which TABLETS are you currently taking?
Which INJECTIONS are you currently receiving?
Which regular INFUSIONS are you currently receiving?

name: Daily Morning Questionnaire
description: A survey to gather information about a patient's daily RA pain.

survey_items.text: How is your Rheumatoid Arthritis today? (0 = best, 10 = worst)
How much pain is your RA causing you today? (0 = No Pain, 10 = Extreme Pain)

name: RA Weekly Medication Survey (Thur)
description: A survey to gather information about a patient's RA medications each week

survey_items.text: Answer the following questions about your medications for your Rheumatoid Arthritis over the LAST WEEK
Have you increased or started a new RA medication?
Please check all medications you have increased or started taking:
Have you reduced or stopped any of your RA medication?
Please check all medications you have reduced or stopped taking:
Have you taken or adjusted the use of steroids?
Please check all steroids you have taken or adjusted:
Please check how you have taken or adjusted Prednisone:
Please check how you have taken or adjusted Methylprednisolone:
Please check how you have taken or adjusted Steroid Injection:
How much of your Rheumatoid Arthritis MEDICATION did you REMEMBER to take LAST WEEK?

name: RA Weekly Flare Survey (Fri)
description: A survey to gather information about a patient's RA flares each week

survey_items.text: Answer the following questions about your Rheumatoid Arthritis for the LAST WEEK
How is your Rheumatoid Arthritis today? (0 = Best, 10 = Worst)
How has your RA been overall?
How much PAIN have you felt due to your RA? (0 = No Pain, 10 = Extreme Pain)
How much difficulty have you had with regular PHYSICAL ACTIVITIES, e.g. dressing, walking, running?
How much FATIGUE have you felt due to your RA?
How much STIFFNESS (overall or in your joints) have you felt due to Rheumatoid Arthritis?
How much difficulty have you had PARTICIPATING in usual work / social / family activities?
How well have you COPED or managed overall with your disease?
Are you currently having a flare?
How long has this flare been going on?
How severe is your current RA flare? (0 = No flare, 10 = Severe flare)
As a result of this "flare", what did you do? (Select all that apply)

choices.text: Spoke to my Rheumatology nurse / doctor.

survey_items.text: Do you have pain / tenderness in your joints?
Select which joints:
Which side is your HAND pain?
How severe is the pain in your LEFT hand?
How severe is the pain in your RIGHT hand?
Which side is your WRIST pain?
How severe is the pain in your LEFT wrist?
How severe is the pain in your RIGHT wrist?
Which side is your ELBOW pain?
How severe is the pain in your LEFT elbow?
How severe is the pain in your RIGHT elbow?
Which side is your SHOULDER pain?
How severe is the pain in your LEFT shoulder?
How severe is the pain in your RIGHT shoulder?
Which side is your HIP pain?
How severe is the pain in your LEFT hip?
How severe is the pain in your RIGHT hip?
Which side is your KNEE pain?
How severe is the pain in your LEFT knee?
How severe is the pain in your RIGHT knee?
Which side is your ANKLE pain?
How severe is the pain in your LEFT ankle?
How severe is the pain in your RIGHT ankle?
Which side is your FOOT pain?
How severe is the pain in your LEFT foot?
How severe is the pain in your RIGHT foot?

name: RA Weekly Activity Survey (Sat)
description: A survey to gather information about a patient's ability to perform activities each week

survey_items.text: During the LAST WEEK, how much difficulty did you have doing the following activities:
Getting dressed (doing buttons, shoelaces, etc)
Getting in or out of bed
Lifting a cup of water to your mouth
Walking on flat ground
Showering / bathing / drying your entire body
Bending down to pick up objects
Turning a faucet on / off
Getting in and out of a car / bus
